name: kickstart-template
title: Kickstart template
description: Kickstart template for my website developments.

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean; npm run clean:wasm
scripts.dev: npm run clean; astro telemetry disable; astro dev --host
scripts.build: npm run clean; astro telemetry disable; astro check; npx dotenv-cli -e .env.prod -- astro build
scripts.build:local: npm run clean; astro telemetry disable; astro check; npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- astro build
scripts.build:wasm: npm run clean:wasm; npm run release:wasm
scripts.build:all: npm run build:local; npm run build:cli; npm run build:wasm
scripts.preview: SERVER_KEY_PATH=./private/localhost-key.pem SERVER_CERT_PATH=./private/localhost.pem HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=443 npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- node ./dist/server/entry.mjs
scripts.update: npm i @astrojs/check @astrojs/mdx @astrojs/netlify @astrojs/node @astrojs/react @astrojs/rss @astrojs/sitemap @astrojs/tailwind @astrojs/vercel @tailwindcss/typography @types/node @types/react @types/react-dom assemblyscript astro dotenv dotenv-cli react react-dom tailwindcss typescript
